contents:
@1348:它的隐私政策是no-log的服务
“VilaVPN guarantees a strict no-logs policy for VilaVPN services, meaning that your activities using VilaVPN Services are provided by automated technical process, are not monitored, recorded, logged, stored or passed to any third party. ”
https://vilavpn.com/index.php?m=PrivacyPolicy
很奇怪的是，这个没中文版本
